question:
Which of the following were present in the Akbar’s Navratnas?
1) Abul Fazl
2) Kabir
3) Fakir Aziao Din
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Akbar was a great lover of the artists and intellectuals. He had a passion for knowledge and interest in learning. He endorsed the court with great minds & genius. Nine of these courtiers were known as Akbar’s Navratnas. And these were: Abul Fazl. Abul Faizi, Fakir Aziao Din, Tansen, Raja Birbal/ Mahesh Das, Raja Todar Mal, Raja Man Singh, Abdul Rahim Khan-i-Khanan, Abdul Rahim Khan-i-Khanan.
